abstract: Former Toyota Motor executive Julie Hamp is freed from police custody in Tokyo; prosecutors say they will not indict her on charges of illegally importing painkiller Oxycodone into Japan.
lead_paragraph: A former Toyota Motor executive was freed from police custody in Tokyo on Wednesday after prosecutors said they would not indict her over drug possession.

headline.main: Ex-Toyota Executive Freed in Pill Case in Japan
headline.print_headline: Ex-Toyota Executive Is Freed in Painkiller Case in Japan

snippet: A former Toyota Motor executive was freed from police custody in Tokyo on Wednesday after prosecutors said they would not indict her over drug possession.
